name: Ponkimp ShoOoOt
description:
A duck hunt inspired game, but with pumpkins, a chonker, and a dabbing alien in a witch costume. How to play:

    - Aim and shoot with your mouse!
    - Press F to activate your automatic gun! Pew pew!
    - You can pause the game anytime with ESC

Game rules:

    - Reach the hunt goal for each round
    - Each successful shot will yield 3 points
    - If you shoot two targets with one shot you will get 5 points
    - Careful! A witch will appear twice per round. The witch requires 3 shots to be taken down
    - Enemies will get faster as you clear rounds
    - Try to obtain a high score!

All assets except for fonts were created by me.
